description: The Bellis perennis 'PAS285179' BELLISSIMA RED is an absolutely stunning English Daisy, a beautiful hardy annual flower that is sure to attract attention. This little beauty has unique and vibrant red daisy petals, contrasting with yellow button centres that make this variety truly eye catching. It grows quickly, making it suitable for any garden size. The flowers are self-cleaning, so deadheaded spent blooms is seldom required. Not only does it look great but it needs very little maintenance and is resistant to many common garden diseases and pests. Many pollinating insects which can help promote other blooming plants are attracted to this flower. All in all, it's an amazing flower for the flower bed or border and truly the Queen of the Daisies.
